name: @splitsoftware/vercel-integration-utils
description: Split SDK wrapper to integrate with Vercel Edge Config

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc --declaration --declarationDir dist/types && tsc -m es6 --outDir dist/esm --declaration false
scripts.publish:rc: npm run test && npm run build && npm publish --tag rc
scripts.publish:stable: npm run test && npm run build && npm publish
